蹸字的基本解释

蹸
lìn
古同“躏”：“蹂蹸其十二三，乃拗怒而少息。”

蹸字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lìn］
［《集韻》良刃切，去震，來。］
(1)车轮碾过。
(2)引申指欺压，欺凌。

蹸字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【足字部】　蹸； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1234第02
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?良刃切，音吝。【說文】轢也。【類篇】行貌。或作躙。　又【集韻】離珍切，音鄰。義同。

蹸字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
蹸字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Kick
lìn
Gu Tong "躏": "To ravage its twelve or three, it is anger and less rest."
Kick
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lìn］
["Ji Yun" cuts with a good blade, go to shake, come. ]
(1) The wheel runs over.
(2) The extension refers to bullying and bullying.
Kick
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Youth Collection】【Foot Character Department】　蹸; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1234 No. 02
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun]? Good blade cut, mean sound. [Said the text] Ke also. 【Classes】Behavior. Or as 躙.　[Jiyun] Li Zhenqie, sound neighbor. The same meaning.
